content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, I am Peter Schmidt. We can start the negotiation. Please make an offer for the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I make an offer of 500 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is too low for me. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I make another offer of 550 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer. Remember, I am trying to get the highest possible price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I make another offer of 575 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is still too low. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer. Remember, I am trying to get the highest possible price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I make another offer of 600 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a better offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer. Remember, I am trying to get the highest possible price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I make another offer of 625 Euros.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a good offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer. Remember, I am trying to get the highest possible price for the apartment.
